Principal House.name: Principal House
Principal House.description: You're in the Principal House. A statue of the hideous Nian towers above you. Upon closer inspection, you see that the statue is missing an eye.

Side Room.name: Side Room
Side Room.description: You're in the Side Room. Before you lies the mythical RUyi Jingu Bang, cracking the earth around it.

Inner Courtyard.name: Inner Courtyard
Inner Courtyard.description: You're in the Inner Courtyard. It is peaceful here.

Western Wing House.name: Western Wing House
Western Wing House.description: You're in the Western Wing House. This was where you remember firecracker merchant staying.

Eastern Wing House.name: Eastern Wing House
Eastern Wing House.description: You're in the Eastern Wing House. You remember how you used to lounge around with friends and family, enjoying the blissfulness that once was.

Opposite House.name: Opposite House
Opposite House.description: You're in the Opposite House. Is it opposite day today?

Screen Wall.name: Screen Wall
Screen Wall.description: You're in the Screen Wall. There's a large mural of a dragon missing an eye.

Gatehouse.name: Gatehouse
Gatehouse.description: You're in the Gatehouse. It feels a little empty in here; the gate could use some decor.

Main Street.name: Main Street
Main Street.description: You're in the Main Street. A couple kids are kicking a Jianzi on the side of the road.

Neighbor's House.name: Neighbor's House
Neighbor's House.description: You knock on the door, but no one answers. Pay me $5.99 for this extension pack.

West Market.name: West Market
West Market.description: You're in the western area of a market. Perhaps it used to be bustling with activity. Unfortunately, there are no shops to rob.

East Market.name: East Market
East Market.description: You're in the eastern area of a market. It is strangely abandoned.

Temple.name: Temple
Temple.description: You're in the Temple. There's a holy energy emenating from the grandiose painting on the walls.

Temple Courtyard.name: Temple Courtyard
Temple Courtyard.description: You're in the Temple Courtyard. Thousands of years of history line the tiling beneath your feet.

Temple Garden.name: Temple Garden
Temple Garden.description: You're in the Temple Garden. You see a beautiful peach blossom tree standing next to a pond.

Cemetery.name: Cemetery
Cemetery.description:
You're in the Cemetery. 
It's dark and dreary out here. To the south, you see a large amount of warning signs

Entrance to Trenches.name: Entrance to Trenches
Entrance to Trenches.description:
You inspect the warning signs. They read:
'Warning: My friend is in the trenches. Wheeler docked him on his E&M test.'

Trenches.name: Trenches
Trenches.description: You're in the Trenches. There is no exit. Press 'q' to quit.
